body.p: Permit me to recommend to your favorable consideration Mr. H W. Hawes -- a gentleman of our city. who stands high as a man of honesty of character and integrity
He visits you upon business which he himself will explain

Jefferson Co
Notary
H. W. Hawes
Appd Jany. 57. 1863
